00128 class NetPar : public ParSpike
00129 {
00130 private:
00131     //static void sppk(std::vector<unsigned char> c, int gid);
00132     inline static void sppk(unsigned char* c, int gid) {
00133         for (register int i = ParSpike::localgid_size_ - 1; i >= 0; --i) {
00134             c[i] = gid & 255;
00135             gid >>= 8;
00136         }
00137     }
00138     inline static int spupk(unsigned char* c) {
00139         int gid = c[0];
00140         for (register int i = 1; i < ParSpike::localgid_size_; ++i) {
00141             gid <<= 8;
00142             gid += c[i];
00143         }
00144         return gid;
00145     }
00146 public:
00147     NetPar(void);
